description.narrative: Annual membership fee. DCED membership will enable the MasterCard Foundation to network, convene and coordinate with key bi- and multi-lateral donors, foundations and research institutions. This will ensure young people are recognized as an integral part of any private sector donor strategy- advancing the objectives of the Youth Learning program to connect young people to the private sector and employment opportunities. It will also ensure Youth Learning partners have up-to-date information on best practices and approaches to engaging private sector actors in youth employment and entrepreneurship projects.
